GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
block: disable the elevator int del_gendisk

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit f28699fafc047ec33299da01e928c3a0073c5cc6, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit e155b0c238b20f0a866f4334d292656665836c8a. For more details please see the references link.
